edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.service

Interface DicewareService


  • public interface DicewareService
    Declaration of proxy methods used to connect to Diceware server application, with singleton-pattern-based instantiation of Retrofit-generated implementation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DicewareService.InstanceHolder 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Completable delete(String token, long id)
      Requests deletion of the specified passphrase associated with the currently logged-in user.
      Single<Passphrase> get(String token, long id)
      Requests a single passphrase of the currently logged-in user, with the specified ID.
      Single<Passphrase> get(String token, String key)
      Requests a single passphrase of the currently logged-in user, with the specified key.
      Observable<List<Passphrase>> getAll(String token)
      Requests all passphrases associated with the currently logged-in user.
      static DicewareService getInstance()
      Returns (constructing as necessary) the singleton instance of the Retrofit-generated instance of this interface.
      Single<Passphrase> post(String token, Passphrase passphrase)
      Sends a new Passphrase to the server, for adding to the collection associated with the currently logged-in user.
      Single<Passphrase> put(String token, long id, Passphrase passphrase, boolean regenerate, int length)
      Sends an updated passphrase, associated with the currently logged-in user, to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        @GET(value="passphrases/")
Observable<List<Passphrase>> getAll(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                               String token)
        Requests all passphrases associated with the currently logged-in user.
        Parameters:
        token - OAuth2.0 token.
        Returns:
        observable list of passphrases.

      • get

        @GET(value="passphrases/{id}")
Single<Passphrase> get(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                      String token,
                                                      @Path(value="id")
                                                      long id)
        Requests a single passphrase of the currently logged-in user, with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        token - OAuth2.0 token.
        id - unique numeric identifier of passphrase.
        Returns:
        observable result.

      • get

        @GET(value="passphrases/{key}")
Single<Passphrase> get(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                       String token,
                                                       @Path(value="key")
                                                       String key)
        Requests a single passphrase of the currently logged-in user, with the specified key.
        Parameters:
        token - OAuth2.0 token.
        key - unique String identifier of passphrase.
        Returns:
        observable result.

      • delete

        @DELETE(value="passphrases/{id}")
Completable delete(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                     String token,
                                                     @Path(value="id")
                                                     long id)
        Requests deletion of the specified passphrase associated with the currently logged-in user.
        Parameters:
        token - OAuth2.0 token.
        id - unique numeric identifier of passphrase.
        Returns:
        observable success/failure result.

      • put

        @PUT(value="passphrases/{id}")
Single<Passphrase> put(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                      String token,
                                                      @Path(value="id")
                                                      long id,
                                                      @Body
                                                      Passphrase passphrase,
                                                      @Query(value="regenerate")
                                                      boolean regenerate,
                                                      @Query(value="length")
                                                      int length)
        Sends an updated passphrase, associated with the currently logged-in user, to the server.
        Parameters:
        token - OAuth2.0 token.
        id - unique numeric identifier of passphrase.
        passphrase - updated Passphrase instance.
        Returns:
        observable result.

      • post

        @POST(value="passphrases/")
Single<Passphrase> post(@Header(value="Authorization")
                                                    String token,
                                                    @Body
                                                    Passphrase passphrase)
        Sends a new Passphrase to the server, for adding to the collection associated with the currently logged-in user.
        Parameters:
        token - OAuth2.0 token.
        passphrase - new Passphrase instance.
        Returns:
        observable result.

      • getInstance

        static DicewareService getInstance()
        Returns (constructing as necessary) the singleton instance of the Retrofit-generated instance of this interface.
        Returns:
        singleton instance.
